explains: n. 建造，建筑；创立，构建；构造，结构；建筑物；语法结构；解释，理解

sentences.en: The railway is still under construction.
sentences.cn: 这条铁路仍在建设之中。

sentences.en: The summer house was a simple wooden construction.
sentences.cn: 那座避暑别墅是简单的木结构建筑。

sentences.en: Construction had slowed because of a dearth of labourers.
sentences.cn: 建筑进程缓慢是因为劳动力不足。
